meanings.definition: A person who gives one-tenth of their income to a church or religious organization.
meanings.sent1: The tithers at our church are generous and kind.
meanings.sent2: Many tithers believe in the importance of supporting their religious community.
meanings.sent3: The tithers decided to have a bake sale to raise extra funds for the church.
meanings.sent4: She was a dedicated tither, pouring her heart into supporting her faith.
meanings.sent5: The image of the tithers lining up to donate is etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Those who regularly contribute a tenth of their earnings to charity or a cause.
meanings.sent1: The tithers in the community center help those in need.
meanings.sent2: Every month, the tithers gather to donate to various causes.
meanings.sent3: The group of tithers organized a fun run to raise money for charity.
meanings.sent4: Her friends jokingly called themselves the 'tithers club' for their regular donations.
meanings.sent5: The tithers' dedication to giving back is truly inspiring.
